Most memorable celebrity pregnancy announcements
 Most memorable celebrity pregnancy announcements of all time
Anushka-Virat, Ranveer-Deepika to Sidharth-Kiara: Most memorable celebrity pregnancy announcements of all time | Times of IndiaAnushka-Virat, Ranveer-Deepika to Sidharth-Kiara: Most memorable celebrity pregnancy announcements of all timeAug 20, 2025CELEB LOOKSetimes.inAnushka Sharma and Virat KohliIn August 2020, Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli surprised fans with a heartwarming Instagram post, showing Anushka’s baby bump. Their caption read, “And then, we were three! Arriving Jan 2021.” Fans flooded the couple with love and best wishes. Their daughter, Vamika, was born on January 11, 2021. Instagram​Ranveer Singh and Deepika PadukoneRanveer Singh and Deepika Padukone announced Deepika’s pregnancy on February 29, 2024, sharing the news on Instagram. The post revealed that she was due in September 2024. The couple welcomed their daughter, Dua Padukone Singh, on September 8, 2024.Instagram​Alia Bhatt and Ranbir KapoorAlia Bhatt shared the news of her pregnancy in June 2022 with a hospital photo alongside Ranbir Kapoor. The caption read, “Our baby... coming soon.” The couple celebrated the arrival of their daughter, Raha Kapoor, on November 6, 2022.Instagram​Varun Dhawan and Natasha DalalIn February 2024, Varun Dhawan announced on Instagram that his wife Natasha Dalal was pregnant. The post showed the couple with their pet dog, and Varun planted a kiss on Natasha’s baby bump. His caption read, “We are pregnant Need all your blessings and love..." Their daughter, Lara, was born on June 3, 2024.Instagram​KL Rahul and Athiya ShettyKL Rahul and Athiya Shetty shared the joyous news of their first child on November 8, 2024. Their joint post stated, "Our beautiful blessing is coming soon. 2025," exciting all their fans. The couple welcomed their baby girl, Evaarah Vipula Rahul, on March 24, 2025.Instagram​Sonam Kapoor and Anand AhujaSonam Kapoor announced her pregnancy in March 2022 through intimate Instagram pictures from her maternity photoshoot with husband Anand Ahuja. Her caption read, "Four hands. To raise you the very best we can. Two hearts. That will beat in unison with yours..." Their son, Vayu, was born on August 20, 2022.InstagramYou may also likeFun facts about the Param Sundari actor ...Genelia D'Souza’s enchanting smile​Neha Dhupia and Angad BediIn August 2018, Neha Dhupia and Angad Bedi announced their first pregnancy with the caption, "Here's to new beginnings... #3ofUs," sharing a series of photographs. Fans were delighted by the news. The couple welcomed their daughter, Mehr Dhupia Bedi, on November 18, 2018, marking a special moment in their family life.Instagram​Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh GroverBipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover announced their pregnancy in September 2022. Sharing a happy Instagram post, the couple revealed they were expecting a baby together, captioned, "A creation manifested by our love, our baby will join us soon and add to our glee.” They welcomed their baby girl Devi on November 12, 2022.Instagram​Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara AdvaniKiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra revealed they were expecting their first child on February 28, 2025. Their Instagram post featured cute baby socks and was captioned, "The greatest gift of our lives👼 Coming soon." The couple welcomed a baby girl on July 15, 2025.InstagramThanks For Reading!Next: Fun facts about the Param Sundari actor Sidharth MalhotraRead Next

When Salman was offered Mannat before SRK
Shah Rukh Khan's iconic Mannat could have been Salman Khan's residence. Salman revealed he was initially offered the bungalow early in his career, but his father, Salim Khan, questioned the need for such a large house. Now, Mannat stands as a testament to Shah Rukh's success, valued at over Rs. 200 crores, with interiors designed by his wife, Gauri Khan.
When Salman Khan revealed he was offered Mannat before Shah Rukh Khan; declined the offer after his father asked: "Itna bade ghar mai karoge kya? | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodWhen Salman Khan revealed he was offered Mannat before Shah Rukh Khan; declined the offer after his father asked: "Itna bade ghar mai karoge kya?"TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyWhen Salman Khan revealed he was offered Mannat before Shah Rukh Khan; declined the offer after his father asked: "Itna bade ghar mai karoge kya?"TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 15:22 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeShah Rukh Khan's iconic Mannat could have been Salman Khan's residence. Salman revealed he was initially offered the bungalow early in his career, but his father, Salim Khan, questioned the need for such a large house. Now, Mannat stands as a testament to Shah Rukh's success, valued at over Rs. 200 crores, with interiors designed by his wife, Gauri Khan.  Shah Rukh Khan, the Baadshah of Bollywood, has been the epitome of dream-come-true moments and manifestation, with his charming aura and undeniable dexterity. For years, his castle Mannat has been the quintessential Mumbai’s famed landmark, where fans line up to take a picture with the gate in the hope that the actor would be visible. However, not everyone knows that another legendary Khan was offered the residence, which would have changed the trajectory.Salman Khan was offered MannatSalman Khan, the Bhai of Bollywood, revealed in an old interview that he was offered to buy the bungalow first, soon after he debuted in the industry. However, he declined the offer after his father, Salim Khan's commented on the matter.The 59-year-old star told Bollywood Hungama that his father asked him, “Itna bade ghar mai karoge kya? (What would you do in such a huge house?)” Quipping on the comment, Khan said, “And now I want to ask Shah Rukh what he does in such a big house?”PollWhat aspect of Shah Rukh Khan's Mannat do you admire the most? Its stunning architectureThe rich history behind itAbout MannatShah Rukh Khan’s Mannat, the six-storey residence in front of the picturesque view of the Arabian Sea, is estimated to be valued at over Rs. 200 crores, according to Housing.com. During the launch of Gauri Khan’s book ‘My Life in Design,’ Khan revealed that he requested his wife to design the interiors, as he didn’t have the money to hire someone who asked more than Khan used to earn per month. Recalling the statement, the actor said, “See, Gauri, you have the artistic talent, why don’t you become the designer of the house?” “The money that we earned over the years, we kept on buying small things. Once we had little money, and we bought a leather fur sofa and all the small things we used to buy,” he revealed. "Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture. Jessica Hines' comment on bond with Aamir in old interview goes viral
Rumors of a past relationship between Aamir Khan and UK-based author Jessica Hines have resurfaced following claims by Aamir's brother, Faissal Khan, that they have an illegitimate child named Jaan.
Jessica Hines' reaction to bonding with Aamir Khan in an old interview goes viral amidst Faissal Khan's recent comments on their affair and child out of wedlock: 'Let's not...' | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodJessica Hines' reaction to bonding with Aamir Khan in an old interview goes viral amidst Faissal Khan's recent comments on their affair and child out of wedlock: 'Let's not...'TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyJessica Hines' reaction to bonding with Aamir Khan in an old interview goes viral amidst Faissal Khan's recent comments on their affair and child out of wedlock: 'Let's not...'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 15:24 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRumors of a past relationship between Aamir Khan and UK-based author Jessica Hines have resurfaced following claims by Aamir's brother, Faissal Khan, that they have an illegitimate child named Jaan.  Jessica Hines who is a UK based author and journalist has been in the news lately for her relationship rumours with Aamir Khan. These rumours were rife for many years now but recently, Aamir's brother Faissal Khan has claimed that Aamir was in a relationship with Jessica and they have an illegitimate child named Jaan, together out of wedlock. Amidst Faisal's recent comments, Jessica's old interview has gone viral. For those not in the know, Jessica is the author of the book, 'Big B: Bollywood Bachchan and Me'. She wrote extensively about Indian cinema and the actors here in the 1990s and early 2000s. As per reports, Aamir and Jessica got close to each other on the sets of 'Ghulaam'. While neither Aamir nor Jessica have publicly addressed their relationship, reportedly Jessica was raising her son Jaan in London. Now amidst Faissal's recent comment, Jessica's old interview has gone viral. During a chat with News18 Showsha, when she was asked about her bonding with the 'Lagaan' actor, she said, "Let's not comment about that." Faissal has broken all ties with Aamir and his family and claimed that they called him mad, tortured him, Aamir also locked him at his house. He said that his family began to treat him badly after they were pressurising him to marry his aunty (His mother's cousin) and he refused. He had then spoken about Aamir's marriages and affair. He had said at the press conference on August 18, "Aamir was married, got divorced from Reena, and then he had a relationship with Jessica Hines, with whom he also has an illegitimate child, out of wedlock."PollDo you believe the rumors about Aamir Khan and Jessica Hines having a child together?Yes, I believe the rumors.No, I don't believe the rumors.On work front, Aamir was last seen in 'Sitaare Zameen Par'. Faissal demands brother Aamir Khan to take a DNA test
Faissal Khan has made serious allegations against his brother, Aamir Khan. He claims Aamir had a child with Jessica Hines during his marriage to Reena. Faissal challenges Aamir to undergo a DNA test to prove or disprove the claim. He also criticizes Aamir's public image. Faissal says Aamir is trying to hide his past relationships.
Faissal Khan demands brother Aamir Khan to take a DNA test after alleging he had an illegal child with Jessica Hines: ‘I have proof of everything...’ | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodFaissal Khan demands brother Aamir Khan to take a DNA test after alleging he had an illegal child with Jessica Hines: ‘I have proof of everything...’TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyFaissal Khan demands brother Aamir Khan to take a DNA test after alleging he had an illegal child with Jessica Hines: ‘I have proof of everything...’TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 13:35 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFaissal Khan has made serious allegations against his brother, Aamir Khan. He claims Aamir had a child with Jessica Hines during his marriage to Reena. Faissal challenges Aamir to undergo a DNA test to prove or disprove the claim. He also criticizes Aamir's public image. Faissal says Aamir is trying to hide his past relationships.  The public dispute between actor Aamir Khan and his brother Faissal Khan has escalated. At a press conference earlier this week, Faissal made a series of startling claims, alleging that the 'Sitaare Zameen Par' actor had a child out of wedlock with British author Jessica Hines. In a new interview, he has now publicly challenged Aamir to take a DNA test to disprove his claim.Read on to learn more about this newest development.Faissal Khan alleges Aamir Khan 'imprisoned' him citing schizophreniaFaissal claims Aamir was with Jessica Hines while married to ReenaIn a press conference earlier this week, Faissal Khan accused Aamir of being in a relationship with Jessica while still married to Reena. He later moved on to live with Kiran. Now, in an interview with Hindustan Times, he went on to reveal, “Everyone knows that he has had a relationship with Jessica and he has a child. He can't deny that. You can do a DNA test. I have proof of everything that I am saying… It's not me who's just fabricating.”Aamir and Reena married in 1986 and have two children, Ira and Junaid. They divorced in 2002.Aamir’s divorce described as turning pointFaissal claimed he witnessed Aamir’s relationship struggles. He added, “I was there around when his relationship was not working with Reena. They got divorced and then he went into his work. I was also struggling with my work.”Faissal Khan further explained, “Around the time of his divorce, Aamir had started his production company, Aamir Khan Productions, with the film 'Lagaan'. He was involved with his work a lot, and Reena was also helping him in the front. I could see his relationship going bad and with everything was happening with Reena, but I couldn't help it. That was his decision. He had to live his life.”Faissal also explained that Aamir’s divorce caused him personal distress. “I was like why are you telling me to get married again,” he said.Faissal accuses Aamir of hiding realityFaissal also criticised Aamir’s public image, claiming it does not match reality. “He is trying to create a clean image for the audience, but you can find out his image by him having so many relationships with women and all that… He likes to whitewash his image which is not the reality,” he saidDisclaimer: This report contains references to statements made by Faissal Khan in a press conference, dated August 18, 2025. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Funniest Chandler Bing moments from ‘Friends’
Matthew Perry will always be remembered as the witty and lovable Chandler Bing from ‘Friends’. On his birth anniversary, let’s look back at some of his funniest and most unforgettable moments from ‘Friends’ that continue to bring smiles to millions of fans around the world.
Matthew Perry's birth anniversary: Funniest Chandler Bing moments from ‘Friends’ Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentenglishhollywoodMatthew Perry's birth anniversary: Funniest Chandler Bing moments from ‘Friends’TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyMatthew Perry's birth anniversary: Funniest Chandler Bing moments from ‘Friends’ETimes.in /  Aug 19, 2025, 0:00 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeFollow us 1/6​Matthew Perry's birth anniversary: Funniest Chandler Bing moments from ‘Friends’Matthew Perry will always be remembered as the witty and lovable Chandler Bing from ‘Friends’. On his birth anniversary, let’s look back at some of his funniest and most unforgettable moments from ‘Friends’ that continue to bring smiles to millions of fans around the world.2/6​Trapped in the ATM vestibule with Jill GoodacreOne of the earliest classic Chandler moments comes when he gets stuck in an ATM vestibule during a city blackout. To make things even more awkward, he is trapped with Victoria’s Secret model Jill Goodacre and Chandler’s nervousness takes over, and we hear his hilarious inner monologue as he struggles to say something “cool” but ends up embarrassing himself instead. His physical comedy shines when he tries to act normal while choking on chewing gum.3/6​"I am moving to yemen!” to escape JaniceChandler’s on-and-off relationship with Janice gave the show some of its funniest storylines. In one episode, he is so desperate to avoid breaking up with her that he blurts out he is moving to Yemen. Janice insists on seeing him off, and Chandler actually buys a ticket to Yemen just to keep the lie going and watching him at the airport, uncomfortably saying goodbye while realizing he might actually have to board the plane, is peak Chandler also his exaggerated expressions and sarcastic remarks make the scene unforgettable.4/6​The “Pivot!” couch disasterOne of the most iconic Friends moments comes when Ross buys a couch and asks Chandler and Rachel to help him move it upstairs. The stairway is too narrow, and Ross keeps screaming “Pivot! Pivot!” While Chandler grows more frustrated and his sarcastic delivery of “Shut up, shut up, shut uuuup!” is one of the funniest lines in the entire series also Chandler’s mixture of exhaustion and wit is what makes the scene so hilarious.5/6​Eating cheesecake off the floorChandler and Rachel accidentally find a cheesecake that doesn’t belong to them, but it tastes so good they can’t resist. At first, they sneak bites, then they argue over it, and eventually, the cheesecake falls on the floor. Instead of stopping, both Chandler and Rachel sit down and eat it off the floor with forks. The sight of Chandler fully enjoying food in such an absurd situation is hilarious.6/6​The bunny costume fiascoIn the Halloween episode, Chandler shows up dressed as a giant pink bunny because Monica wanted him to wear it and his embarrassment is clear from the moment he walks in, and his sarcastic complaints make the costume even funnier. When Joey arrives dressed as Chandler, the situation gets even more hilarious and also Chandler, who always prided himself on being sarcastic and smart, is forced into looking completely ridiculous.Follow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   PreviousNayanthara’s transformation: Glowing brighter with timeindiaTop 5 zodiac signs who are truly spiritual soulsindia9 vegetarian-friendly countries that should be on your travel wishlisttravel​Saiee Manjrekar looks radiant in different styles​indiaVerdict of Rajinikanth's last 10 films before 'Coolie'indiaIn pics: Stunning looks of Jennifer-Jim spotted amid ENGAGEMENT buzz
Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox recently enjoyed a double date with their respective partners, Jim Curtis and Johnny McDaid, at Nobu in Malibu, sparking relationship buzz. Reports suggest Aniston and Curtis are deeply in love and considering marriage, with plans for a dreamy beach wedding in Cabo. This comes amid speculation that Aniston is ready to tie the knot again.

Reports suggest Aniston and Curtis are deeply in love and considering marriage, with plans for a dreamy beach wedding in Cabo. This comes amid speculation that Aniston is ready to tie the knot again.  Hollywood's BFFs Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox reunited for a casual day out with their partners and photos from their double date are fuelling speculations. The 'Friends' stars were spotted with their partners at Nobu in Malibu. While Aniston was accompanied by her hypnotist boyfriend Jim Curtis, Cox was joined by longtime partner and Snow Patrol musician Johnny McDaid. Dinner datePaparazzi spotted the couple on their exit from the restaurant after dinner. The spotting comes amidst ongoing buzz about Aniston’s blossoming romance with her beau, with reports stating that the actress may just be ready to give marriage another shot.Wedding buzzAccording to Radar Online, Aniston and Curtis, who have known each other for years but only started dating a few months ago, are reportedly ready to go all in and tie the knot. The report states that the two are “madly in love” and sees Curtis as her “forever guy” after two failed marriages. “Jen and Jim are crazy about each other, and she’s at a stage in life that’s tired of the dating playing field. She’s going all in on this romance,” an insider told the portal.Wedding planningThe couple is said to have already discussed their future together and according to the report, are even planning their dreamy beach wedding. It goes on to state that Aniston is reportedly considering an intimate ceremony in Cabo, surrounded by close friends.The Emmy-winning actress was first linked to Curtis last month, after the pair were spotted packing on the PDA while holidaying in Spain. They were even seen spending time in New York with the actress' friends Jason Bateman and Amanda Anka.While neither Aniston nor Curtis has publicly addressed their blossoming romance. If rumours of a marriage on the cards is true, then this will be heer third time down the aisle. She was first married to Brad Pitt from 2000 to 2005. A decade later, she wed Justin Theroux in a secret wedding and parted ways two years later in 2017."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Aishwarya gives off boss lady vibes in fierce NEW pic
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan is creating a buzz online with a striking photo from a recent campaign shoot, shared by her makeup artist. The image showcases her in a powerful, boss-lady look, reminiscent of her role in the film 'Jazbaa'. She also shared an empowering message about the impact of social media on young minds.
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s fierce NEW photo will remind you of her lawyer role in 'Jazbaa' | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAishwarya Rai Bachchan’s fierce NEW photo will remind you of her lawyer role in 'Jazbaa'TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyAishwarya Rai Bachchan’s fierce NEW photo will remind you of her lawyer role in 'Jazbaa'TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 13:33 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeAishwarya Rai Bachchan is creating a buzz online with a striking photo from a recent campaign shoot, shared by her makeup artist. The image showcases her in a powerful, boss-lady look, reminiscent of her role in the film 'Jazbaa'. She also shared an empowering message about the impact of social media on young minds.  There's a new photo of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, and it is taking social media by storm.Ash, who made waves early this week for her motivating post for a global beauty brand, hit the social media trends once again when a stunning photo from the campaign shoot turned up online. The actress' makeup artist, Ardian Jacobs, took to Instagram to share the stunning click online. The stunning click gave fans a closer look at Ash's boss-lady look. For the shoot, she donned a crisp white shirt and topped it off with what seemed to be cape coat. Shrima Rai Recreates Aishwarya Rai’s Cannes Look—Months after Clout DenialThe new picThe latest photo is reminiscent of her powerful turn as a lawyer in the 2015 film Jazbaa. In the Sanjay Gupta-directed thriller, the actress played the role of a criminal lawyer who juggled her high-stakes courtroom battle of defending a criminal, all while trying to save her kidnapped daughter.Ash's new ad shootIn the video from the ad shoot, Ash shared a rather empowering message for all her fans. She says, "There’s not much difference between social media and social pressure. As a woman and a mother, it’s a matter of grave concern to think about the power it can have over young minds. Frankly, even impressionable adults."Recent spottingThe actress, who has been keeping a relatively low profile in recent months, continues to stay in the spotlight through her occasional public appearances. She was most recently spotted at the Mumbai airport, on her return from her holiday with hubby Abhishek Bachchan and daughter Aaradhya Bachchan. Fans were particularly bowled over with the mother-daughter twinning their looks and hairstyles for the casual family outing."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Anupam Kher gives fitness goals at 70 - Watch
Anupam Kher, the 70-year-old actor, inspires with his dedication to fitness, sharing workout videos showcasing his intense lat pulldowns and commitment. He emphasizes consistency, motivating fans to adopt a healthy lifestyle. Research highlights the benefits of exercise for older adults, improving cardiovascular health, strength, cognitive function, and overall well-being, encouraging personalized plans and community support.

riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.” In the video, the 70-year-old actor can be seen working out without his shirt. His sweat speaks for his efforts, as he executes several lat pulldowns with intense focus and resolve.Anupam Kher Laughs at Confusing Modern Toilet Signs—Can Someone Just Keep It Simple?Also, it is worth noting that this isn’t Anupam Kher’s motivating only workout post. Earlier as well, the actor has shared such posts on his social media. In one of them, he shared two black-and-white images, motivating his fans to follow a committed fitness regimen for a healthier way of living. “It is hard to beat a person who never gives up!!” and playfully asked, “Sahi jaa raha hu na? exercising in old ageA study featured in the Journal of the Indian Academy of Geriatrics (2024) indicates that regular physical activity greatly enhances cardiovascular health, muscle strength, bone density, cognitive abilities, and overall quality of life for older adults. Also, everyone can have their personalized exercise plans, robust community support, and the integration of technology to foster long-term commitment and encourage healthy aging."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. ‘Coolie’ becomes Rajinikanth’s third biggest hit in India
Rajinikanth's new movie Coolie is doing well. It earned a lot of money on the first day in Tamil Nadu. The film made Rs 216 crore in India in just six days. Coolie is now Rajinikanth's third-biggest movie in India. Only 2.0 and Jailer earned more. Rajinikanth is still a big star even with younger actors coming up.
‘Coolie’ becomes Rajinikanth’s third biggest hit in India | Tamil Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardsNewsentertainmenttamilmoviesbox-office‘Coolie’ becomes Rajinikanth’s third biggest hit in IndiaTrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun Chakraborty‘Coolie’ becomes Rajinikanth’s third biggest hit in IndiaTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 14:47 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRajinikanth's new movie Coolie is doing well. It earned a lot of money on the first day in Tamil Nadu. The film made Rs 216 crore in India in just six days. Coolie is now Rajinikanth's third-biggest movie in India. Only 2.0 and Jailer earned more. Rajinikanth is still a big star even with younger actors coming up.  Rajinikanth's new movie Coolie is doing well. It earned a lot of money on the first day in Tamil Nadu. The film made Rs 216 crore in India in just six days. Coolie is now Rajinikanth's third-biggest movie in India. Only 2.0 and Jailer earned more. Rajinikanth is still a big star even with younger actors coming up.  Rajinikanth has once again proven why he remains the undisputed superstar of Indian cinema. His latest release, Coolie directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has stormed the box office and officially emerged as the megastar’s third biggest hit in India, standing tall behind 2.0 (2018) and Jailer (2023).Released with massive anticipation, Coolie opened to a thunderous Rs 65 crore Day 1, the highest-ever for Rajinikanth in Tamil Nadu. The film’s first weekend collections were rock solid, with Rs 54.75 crore on Friday, Rs 39.5 crore on Saturday, and Rs 35.25 crore on Sunday, taking the opening four-day total to Rs 194.5 crore. Despite the usual weekday drop, the film still managed to earn Rs 12 crore on Monday and an estimated Rs 9.5 crore on Tuesday, pushing its six-day India total to Rs 216 crore.‘Coolie’ release sparks madness: Rajinikanth fans dance and flood theatres in Tamil NaduWhen compared to Rajinikanth’s previous blockbusters, Coolie is now firmly positioned as his third-biggest grosser in India. 2.0, directed by Shankar, remains on top with a mammoth Rs 407.05 crore India net, followed by Nelson’s Jailer, which amassed Rs 348.55 crore during its run. Coolie though has been losing audience with each passing day but it is still running strong with the current trend the film is eyeing a lifetime total in the Rs 275-300 crore range if the films gets a huge push in the coming weekend.PollIs 'Coolie' likely to reach a lifetime total of Rs 275-300 crore?Yes, it has the potential.No, it's losing audience.The film’s success highlights Rajinikanth’s enduring box office power even in an era dominated by younger stars and pan-India spectacles. Unlike 2.0, which was mounted as a high-budget sci-fi extravaganza with a wider Hindi market appeal, and Jailer, which benefitted from tremendous word-of-mouth, Coolie is a more mass-oriented Rajinikanth vehicle. Yet, its ability to pull in over Rs 200 crore within a week underscores the superstar’s unshakable connect with audiences.For context, recent South biggies from contemporaries haven’t delivered with the same consistency. While Jailer and Pushpa 2 broke records, many other star vehicles have seen steep drops post-opening. In contrast, Rajinikanth’s films have continued to command historic openings and sustained runs, proving his unparalleled stature across decades.With Coolie officially becoming his third highest-grossing film in India, Rajinikanth now holds the rare distinction of delivering three of Tamil cinema’s all-time biggest blockbusters in different genres and phases of his career. At 74, the Thalaivar shows no signs of slowing down, reminding the industry why he remains its most bankable icon. His next is going to be Jailer 2 with Nelson with talks already happening about collaborating with Lokesh again for a film with Kamal Haasan. "Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Malayalam director Nissar passes away at 65
Malayalam cinema mourns the loss of Director Nissar, aged 65, known for his commercially successful, low-budget films. He passed away while undergoing treatment for liver and lung ailments. Nissar's debut film, 'Sudhinam,' launched the careers of Dileep and Indrans, and he consistently provided opportunities for newcomers and mimicry artists, leaving a lasting impact on the industry.
Malayalam director Nissar passes away at 65; leaves behind 24 films that redefined low-budget cinema; read more | Malayalam Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamilmalayalamtelugukannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmentmalayalammoviesMalayalam director Nissar passes away at 65; leaves behind 24 films that redefined low-budget cinema; read moreTrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyMalayalam director Nissar passes away at 65; leaves behind 24 films that redefined low-budget cinema; read moreEntertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 12:13 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeMalayalam cinema mourns the loss of Director Nissar, aged 65, known for his commercially successful, low-budget films. He passed away while undergoing treatment for liver and lung ailments. Nissar's debut film, 'Sudhinam,' launched the careers of Dileep and Indrans, and he consistently provided opportunities for newcomers and mimicry artists, leaving a lasting impact on the industry. (Picture Courtesy: Facebook) Malayalam cinema has lost one of its most distinctive filmmakers. Director Nissar, known for crafting commercially successful films with modest budgets, passed away at the age of 65. A native of Thrikkodithanam Pulikkottupadi in Changanassery, he was the son of the late Abdul Khader.TRIGGER WARNING: This article contains mention of death.According to Madhyamam, Nissar had been undergoing treatment for liver and lung-related ailments before he breathed his last. Reportedly the funeral is scheduled to take place on August 20, Wednesday.directorial debut with 'Sudhinam'Nissar made his directorial debut with 'Sudhinam' (1994), starring Jayaram and Dileep. The film not only gave actress Madhavi a memorable role as an independent woman but also became a milestone in the careers of Dileep and Indrans. For Dileep, the movie is surely a pivotal one in his career.Nissar gave opportunities for newcomers and mimicry artistsThroughout his career, Nissar displayed a sharp eye for talent. He gave opportunities to newcomers and mimicry artists, many of whom went on to become household names in Malayalam cinema. He has also collaborated with Vijayaraghavan in films such as 'British Market' and 'Adukkala Rahasyam Angadipattu'.the master of low-budget hitsNissar carved a niche with his economic filmmaking style in an industry where high budget movies with star casts dominated. Reportedly, he minimized shooting days, worked with small budgets. He smartly utilized the star value of rising actors. This formula resulted in unexpected box-office successes, establishing him as a director who could create impact without extravagance.Some of the other works of Nissar include 'Malayaalamaasam Chingam Onninu', 'Padanayakan', 'Captain', 'Auto Brothers', 'Dupe Dupe Dupe', 'Bullet', and 'Colours'."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorEntertainment Deskमटा मनोरंजन डेस्क ही मराठी आणि हिंदी चित्रपट, ओटीटी, संगीत, मराठी टीव्ही कार्यक्रम, वेब सिरीज आणि सेलिब्रिटी बातम्यांवर केंद्रित एक उत्साही टीम आहे. चित्रपट समीक्षण, कलाकारांच्या मुलाखती, ट्रेलर विश्लेषण, गॉसिप्स आणि सोशल मीडिया ट्रेंड्सवरील विश्वासार्ह आणि मनोरंजक माहिती आम्ही सर्जनशील शैलीत वाचकांपर्यंत पोहोचवितो. माहिती आणि मनोरंजन यांचा समतोल राखणे हे आमचे वैशिष्ट्य आहे.Read MoreEnd of ArticleFollow Us On Social Media Visual Stories   Previous9 simple tips to lower blood pressure naturallyLifestyleIn pics: Adorable looks of Chandhini PrakashtvZodiac signs that feel loneliness the mostastrologyLife lessons to learn from Samantha Ruth PrabhuEntertainmentNayanthara’s transformation: Glowing brighter with timeEntertainmentTop 5 zodiac signs who are truly spiritual soulsastrologyVerdict of Rajinikanth's last 10 films before 'Coolie'EntertainmentIn pics: Stunning looks of Subhashree GangulytvSaiee Manjrekar looks radiant in different stylesEntertainmentIs stress taking over your new parenthood? Actresses and cricketers who were rumoured to be dating
Rumours often swirl around Bollywood stars and cricketers. Sara Ali Khan addressed rumours linking her to Shubman Gill. Nidhhi Agerwal and KL Rahul clarified they were just friends. Izabelle Leite confirmed dating Virat Kohli. Deepika Padukone and Yuvraj Singh's relationship was short-lived. Sushmita Sen denied wedding rumours with Wasim Akram. Amrita Singh and Ravi Shastri's romance ended in the 1980s.
From Sara Ali Khan-Shubman Gill to Izabelle Leite-Virat Kohli: Bollywood actresses and cricketers who were rumoured to be dating | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodFrom Sara Ali Khan-Shubman Gill to Izabelle Leite-Virat Kohli: Bollywood actresses and cricketers who were rumoured to be datingTrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyFrom Sara Ali Khan-Shubman Gill to Izabelle Leite-Virat Kohli: Bollywood actresses and cricketers who were rumoured to be datingTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 14:52 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRumours often swirl around Bollywood stars and cricketers. Sara Ali Khan addressed rumours linking her to Shubman Gill. Nidhhi Agerwal and KL Rahul clarified they were just friends. Izabelle Leite confirmed dating Virat Kohli. Deepika Padukone and Yuvraj Singh's relationship was short-lived. Sushmita Sen denied wedding rumours with Wasim Akram. Amrita Singh and Ravi Shastri's romance ended in the 1980s.  Bollywood and cricket are two worlds that capture the hearts of millions, not just in India but across the globe. With glamour on one side and sports stardom on the other, it’s no surprise that rumours of romances often make headlines. From dinner dates to spotted outings, the public is always curious to know if a Bollywood actress is secretly seeing a cricket star. Some rumours are quickly dismissed, while others linger for years. Let’s take a closer look at the actresses who were linked to cricketers.Sara Ali Khan and Shubman GillSara Ali Khan sparks dating buzz after gurudwara visit with rumoured beau Arjun BajwaRumours of a relationship between Sara Ali Khan and cricketer Shubman Gill began when they were spotted together on a dinner date. However, Sara addressed the speculation on 'Koffee With Karan' Season 8. With humour, she said, “You have got the wrong Sara, guys. Sara ka sara duniya galat Sara ke peechay pada hai.” This may have been a reference to Sara Tendulkar, daughter of cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar, who was also rumoured to be dating the young cricketer.Nidhhi Agerwal and KL RahulNidhhi Agerwal, who works in Telugu, Tamil and Hindi films, was rumoured to be dating cricketer KL Rahul after they were seen together several times. Both made it clear they were only friends. KL Rahul had told NDTV, “I have known her for a long time, we both come from the same city. It's great to see the progress she is making in her field. We have known each other even when I was a cricketer and she was a Bollywood actress. It was not just me and her hanging out, there were three or four more people from Bangalore. It's good to catch up with friends and I assure you there is nothing happening.” KL Rahul is now married to actress Athiya Shetty, and the couple welcomed daughter Evaarah earlier this yearPollShould celebrities openly address relationship rumors more often?Yes, it avoids misunderstandingsNo, personal life should stay privateIzabelle Leite and Virat KohliBrazilian model and actress Izabelle Leite seen in movies like ‘Talaash’ reportedly dated cricketer Virat Kohli for almost two years. She had told Bollywood Hungama, “Virat was one of the first Indian friends I had when I came to India. We were dating for quite a while. We were together for almost two years. But we didn't want to make it public. So yeah, Virat and I did have a relationship. But Sidharth is only my friend and yes, we do spend time together as well.”Deepika Padukone and Yuvraj SinghBack in time, Deepika Padukone and cricketer Yuvraj Singh were seen together on dinner dates, leading to dating rumours. As quoted by Telegraph India, Yuvraj explained, “I had just come back from South Africa and we met through common friends in Mumbai. We liked each other and wanted to know more.” However, their busy schedules prevented a long-term relationship.He added, “We didn’t spend enough time with each other to know if it was going to be a long-term thing. As things turned out she moved on and so did I. Well, she was with me and now she's moved on with another person. I guess it's her personal choice. If someone wants to move out of a relationship, there isn't much that the other person can do. I am not blaming anyone but just stating the facts.”Sushmita Sen and Wasim AkramSushmita Sen and Pakistani cricketer Wasim Akram were judging the reality show 'Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena' in 2008. Their closeness sparked rumours of a relationship, as they were seen together on multiple occasions. Sushmita later cleared the air on social media, “Hi guys! Been reading about my upcoming wedding with Wasim... ABSOLUTE RUBBISH!!! Goes to show just how irresponsible media can be sometimes! Wasim Akram is a friend and will always be one!! He has a wonderful lady in his life... rumours like these are uncalled for n disrespectful! My beautiful people..when I find 'THE ONE'...you'll be the first to know :)) benefits of being my twitter family!! ;) love u all soooooo much.”Amrita Singh and Ravi ShastriBack in the 1980s, Amrita Singh and cricketer Ravi Shastri were rumoured to be dating. Amrita was often seen cheering for Ravi from the stands. However, the relationship ended, and both went on to marry other people, Amrita tied the knot with Saif Ali Khan and Ravi married Ritu Singh. In a throwback video Ravi had recalled a shy first meeting with Amrita, “When I first met my girlfriend, Amrita, you might know her from films, it was at a restaurant in Mumbai. For the first ten minutes, I didn't say a word. I always knew I was shy around girls, but I didn't expect to be completely speechless. She kept talking for the entire ten minutes. It was one of my most embarrassing moments.”"Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Virat kissing Anushka was photog's favourite pic
Joseph Radhik, the photographer behind Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma's dreamy Tuscany wedding, reminisces about the experience. He highlights the couple's request for authentic, unretouched images and the overwhelming reach of his work, even to unexpected corners of India. While unfazed by Virat, Radhik admits being star-struck photographing Priyanka Chopra's wedding to Nick Jonas.

He highlights the couple's request for authentic, unretouched images and the overwhelming reach of his work, even to unexpected corners of India. While unfazed by Virat, Radhik admits being star-struck photographing Priyanka Chopra's wedding to Nick Jonas.  Celebrity photographer Joseph Radhik, who captured the intimate and dreamy wedding of Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma in Tuscany in 2017, has opened up about his experience, capturing priceless moments from the couple's special day. Shooting the Virushka weddingThe celebrity photographer, who appeared on a news channel, spilled the beans about the hush-hush wedding and revealed why it still is his favourite celebrity wedding to date. Calling it one of the most defining moments of his career, Radhik revealed to News18, "When I shot Virat-Anushka's wedding in 2017, it was extremely special for me. It is a photographer's dream for their work to be seen by a few million people. To think that my work went so viral in that moment, and to think that so many people saw it across the world... that was surreal.”Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma’s Secret London Date Caught on CameraPhotos going viralThe photographer also recalled how overwhelming it was to see his images reach unexpected corners of India. While admitting other photographers often argue about the copyright of their images, he said, "But I was on the other end, super happy, grinning to see my images on places like a barber shop in Udaipur, on a pathaka dabba, or somewhere on the back of an auto. That entire year after Virat and Anushka's wedding was sublime.”Favourite photoWhen asked to pick his favourite photo from the entire wedding album, he revealed that Virat kissing Anushka on her forehead during the wedding celebrations was his favourite. Anushka's brief before the weddingWhen asked about the brief given to him, Radhik shared that Anushka had only one request, which was - to keep the images real. He shared with the portal, “Their input primarily was that I should be there to document the wedding, so that the world can see the kind of wedding they had, without any input from me or them during those moments."The photographer, who has been the man behind some of the biggest celeb weddings to date, including Vicky Kaushal and Katrina Kaif to Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, he shared, "The brides mostly gave me the brief." He went on to add that when it came to Virat and Anushka's wedding, the photos were not even retouched in any way. He pointed out, "You can even see the crow's feet near their eyes. None of these images were retouched. It was just me editing and sharing them within minutes."On being star-struckDespite being a lifelong cricket fan, Radhik said he did not feel star-struck photographing the star couple. He noted, "Those two were just so happy, there was no star presence around them. I was just grinning from left to right that day."However, he admitted that one celebrity wedding did leave him awe-struck was that of Priyanka Chopra’s grand wedding to Nick Jonas. “I’ve always been a Desi Girl fan. When she was getting ready in her red lehenga, Mickey Contractor doing her makeup, I just thought, ‘Oh my God, I’m photographing Priyanka Chopra’s wedding,’” he confessed.Viral and Anushka were recently in the news when the two were spotted enjoying a quiet day out and about the streets of London. The couple was seen rocking a casual look as they stepped out and even spent a while chatting with locals around a street corner. According to reports they have decided to shift base to the UK to raise their two children Vamika and Akaay, away from the spotlight."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Saiyaara breaches Rs 325 crore mark
Mohit Suri's romantic musical drama, 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Anette Padda, has grossed Rs 325.11 crore in 33 days. Despite competition from 'Coolie' and 'War 2,' the film sustained footfalls, driven by positive word-of-mouth and repeat viewings, especially among younger audiences. Cinema chains have re-added shows due to continued demand. 'Saiyaara' has become the 14th biggest hit in Hindi cinema.
Mohit Suri, Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda’s ‘Saiyaara’ breaches Rs 325 Crore mark , bounces back with added shows across India | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsbox officemovie reviewsmovie listingsanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamilteluguNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodbox-officeMohit Suri, Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda’s ‘Saiyaara’ breaches Rs 325 Crore mark , bounces back with added shows across IndiaTrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyMohit Suri, Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda’s ‘Saiyaara’ breaches Rs 325 Crore mark , bounces back with added shows across IndiaTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 11:54 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeMohit Suri's romantic musical drama, 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Anette Padda, has grossed Rs 325.11 crore in 33 days. Despite competition from 'Coolie' and 'War 2,' the film sustained footfalls, driven by positive word-of-mouth and repeat viewings, especially among younger audiences. Cinema chains have re-added shows due to continued demand. 'Saiyaara' has become the 14th biggest hit in Hindi cinema. Mohit Suri's romantic musical drama, 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Anette Padda, has grossed Rs 325.11 crore in 33 days. Despite competition from 'Coolie' and 'War 2,' the film sustained footfalls, driven by positive word-of-mouth and repeat viewings, especially among younger audiences. Cinema chains have re-added shows due to continued demand. 'Saiyaara' has become the 14th biggest hit in Hindi cinema. Mohit Suri’s Saiyaara, starring Ahaan Panday and Anette Padda, has crossed yet another milestone at the box office. The romantic musical drama has now collected Rs 325.11 crore in 33 days. The film has added Rs 2.51crore to its collection since the release of Rajinikanth’s Coolie and Hrithik Roshan-Jr NTR starrer War 2 which accounted for most screens across the country.The film opened to a steady start on Day 1 with Rs 21.5 crore, followed by strong weekday hold and an impressive weekend surge, peaking at Rs 35.75 crore on its third day. By the end of its first week the film had collected Rs 172.75 crore, Week 2 stood at Rs 107.75 crore, Week 3 was at 28.25 crore and in Week 4 the film collected Rs 14.1 crore and after counting six days of week 5, the film’s total collection now stands at RS 325.11 crore. Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda’s chemistry steals the show at 'Saiyaara' success bashWhile facing tough competition from Coolie and War 2 and with least number of shows in its journey the film maintained a steady inflow of footfalls. Word of mouth and repeat viewing, especially among younger audiences who connected with its music and tender love story, kept the numbers ticking. As soon as the weekend rush for Coolie and War 2 began to stabilize, cinema chains across the country took note of the sustained demand for Saiyaara. This week, several multiplexes and even single-screen theatres have re-added shows for the film to cater to its growing popularity.This renewed demand comes at a crucial juncture. On Day 33, Saiyaara added Rs31 lakhs to its tally, pushing the film past the coveted Rs 325 crore benchmark. The film has already become the 14th biggest hit of Hindi Cinema but it seems unlikely the film will be able to make it to the 13th rank as that is taken by Salman Khan’s Tiger Zinda Hai with Rs 339.16 crore collection. Swara Bhasker faces criticism over sexuality remarks
Swara Bhasker's recent remarks on sexuality have ignited controversy online. During an interview, she stated, "If you leave people to themselves, they are all bisexuals." Bhasker also confessed to having a crush on Dimple Yadav, wife of politician Akhilesh Yadav. Her statements have drawn criticism from netizens, with many questioning her views on sexuality and the concept of heterosexuality.
Swara Bhasker faces criticism over sexuality remarks, reveals having crush on Akhilesh Yadav’s wife Dimple Yadav - Here’s what we know | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodSwara Bhasker faces criticism over sexuality remarks, reveals having crush on Akhilesh Yadav’s wife Dimple Yadav - Here’s what we knowTrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortySwara Bhasker faces criticism over sexuality remarks, reveals having crush on Akhilesh Yadav’s wife Dimple Yadav - Here’s what we knowTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 10:38 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeSwara Bhasker's recent remarks on sexuality have ignited controversy online. During an interview, she stated, "If you leave people to themselves, they are all bisexuals." Bhasker also confessed to having a crush on Dimple Yadav, wife of politician Akhilesh Yadav. Her statements have drawn criticism from netizens, with many questioning her views on sexuality and the concept of heterosexuality.  Swara Bhasker is one of the actresses who is often seen in the news for her strong and bold statements. She hardly uses a filter while sharing her opinion on anything and everything under the sun has been unfiltered. While some appreciate this characteristic of the actress, there have been times when her outspoken views sparked a debate and brought criticism for the actress. Even recently, Swara Bhasker’s remark on sexuality and identity has gone viral, and it seems to have not gone down well with the netizens.Read on to know more about what Swara Bhasker said on the subject of sexuality.Swara Bhasker believes all humans are bisexualIn a recent interaction with Screen, Swara Bhasker said, “If you leave people to themselves, they are all bisexual, but heterosexuality is an ideology that has been put in us for thousands of years.” Swara Bhasker hits back at troll calling her husband ‘street vendor from Dongri’She continued, “Because that is how the human race will perpetuate, so it has to be the norm.” Swara’s husband, Fahad Ahmad, was also present at the interview when she remarked.Swara Bhasker has a crush on Akhilesh Yadav’s wifeIn the same conversation, the host inquired about Swara’s crush, and she confessed having one on Uttar Pradesh’s former Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav’s wife, Dimple Yadav. She jokingly said that now, after this remark, her husband’s political career in UP will also be affected. Netizens troll Swara for her bisexual remarkThe statements made by Swara Bhasker didn’t go down well with the netizens. While some tried to see humour in it and joked, some simply called her out.“If I understand her correctly She's saying that we're essentially not designed to eat food but we eat because it will help us perpetually survive,” wrote one internet user, while another one commented, “Ooooo I’m hearing this statement of us been born bisexuals after a good span of over two decades. Being a student of literature and attending various seminars, this used to be the most popular statement we were fed back then. My god this woman is stuck in time.”Reacting to the viral video, another X user wrote - “She is brainwashed. She thinks only men should be heterosexual as per her learning. Woman dont have rights to become heterosexual. She is doomed as a sane person.”“Why Is she speaking up for all? Who is she ? I am not bisexual. I dont think heterosexual is to expand generation . What is she saying,” wrote another netizen."Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Coolie beats Mahavatar Narsimha as 3rd biggest Indian film
Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' has swiftly grossed Rs 216 crore in six days, surpassing 'Mahavatar Narsimha' as the third-highest grosser of 2025. Despite competition from 'War 2', 'Coolie' reaffirms Rajinikanth's box office dominance. 'Mahavatar Narsimha', an animated film, has earned Rs 215.49 crore, marking a milestone as the first Indian animation to cross Rs 200 crore, highlighting diverse audience preferences.
Rajinikanth’s ‘Coolie’ edges past ‘Mahavatar Narsimha' to claim third biggest Indian film of 2025 | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsbox officemovie reviewsmovie listingsanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamilteluguNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodbox-officeRajinikanth’s ‘Coolie’ edges past ‘Mahavatar Narsimha' to claim third biggest Indian film of 2025TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesNadiraAR MurugadossArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyRajinikanth’s ‘Coolie’ edges past ‘Mahavatar Narsimha' to claim third biggest Indian film of 2025TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 15:19 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeRajinikanth's 'Coolie' has swiftly grossed Rs 216 crore in six days, surpassing 'Mahavatar Narsimha' as the third-highest grosser of 2025. Despite competition from 'War 2', 'Coolie' reaffirms Rajinikanth's box office dominance. 'Mahavatar Narsimha', an animated film, has earned Rs 215.49 crore, marking a milestone as the first Indian animation to cross Rs 200 crore, highlighting diverse audience preferences. Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' has swiftly grossed Rs 216 crore in six days, surpassing 'Mahavatar Narsimha' as the third-highest grosser of 2025. Despite competition from 'War 2', 'Coolie' reaffirms Rajinikanth's box office dominance. 'Mahavatar Narsimha', an animated film, has earned Rs 215.49 crore, marking a milestone as the first Indian animation to cross Rs 200 crore, highlighting diverse audience preferences. The year 2025 has already proven to be a landmark year for Indian cinema at the box office. From big-ticket star vehicles to high-concept experiments, audiences have turned out in large numbers, rewarding both spectacle and novelty. This week, Rajinikanth’s Coolie added another milestone to the record books by edging out Mahavatar Narsimha to become the third biggest grosser of the year so far, amassing Rs 216 crore in just six days of its release.The first two spots have been captured by Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava with Rs 601.57 crore and Mohit Suri's Saiyaara with Rs 325.11 crore. When it comes to Coolie it's major collections have come from Tamil version while for Mahavatar Narsimha, the Hindi version has led the charge. According to trade figures, Coolie opened with a thunderous Rs 65 crore on Thursday, riding on Rajinikanth’s pan-India appeal and high anticipation surrounding Lokesh Kanagaraj’s directorial. The film maintained strong momentum over its extended opening weekend, posting Rs 54.75 crore on Friday, Rs 39.5 crore on Saturday, and Rs 35.25 crore on Sunday. Even though collections dropped on Monday and Tuesday Rs 12 crore and Rs 9.5 crore respectively, the six-day total stood at a formidable Rs 216 crore.Rajinikanth turns 50 in cinema: Fans go crazy, stars shower praiseThis tally puts Coolie just above Mahavatar Narsimha, which is holding out on screens despite facing competition from all big films since its release. The film in its 25 day run till now has collected Rs 215.49 crore. While the difference is marginal, the achievement is significant considering the competition both films faced in their theatrical journeys.For Rajinikanth, Coolie reaffirms his box office dominance after Jailer, and now joins his career’s biggest successes behind 2.0 and Jailer. The film’s success comes despite clashing with War 2 headlined by Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR.On the other hand, Mahavatar Narsimha deserves equal recognition for carving its own unique chapter in 2025’s box office story. Directed by Ashwin Kumar, the animated mythological spectacle defied conventional expectations by not only sustaining against heavyweights like Saiyaara, Son of Sardaar 2, War 2, and eventually Coolie, but also by emerging as the first Indian animation film ever to cross the Rs 200 crore mark. The Hindi version of the film has till now collected Rs 163.49 crore making it the sixth biggest Hindi hit of the year, trailing behind Aamir Khan’s Sitaare Zameen Par in the Hindi market.What makes this comparison remarkable is the sheer contrast between the two films. Coolie is a Rajinikanth action entertainer designed for mass appeal, while Mahavatar Narsimha relied on storytelling innovation and the growing acceptance of animation features in India. That both films managed to cross Rs 215 crore in the same year underscores the diversity of Indian audiences’ tastes and their willingness to embrace both spectacle and substance.But while the box office collection is similar, Mahavatar is already into profit zone and its return on investment is going to be huge as compared to Coolie which is losing audience with each passing day. The true test for Coolie would be if the collections can spike over the second weekend as no new big film is releasing. "Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. Prabhas and Anushka Shetty to reunite after 8 years
Prabhas and Anushka Shetty, celebrated for their iconic roles in 'Baahubali,' are reportedly reuniting for a special interview after nearly eight years, commemorating the tenth anniversary of 'Baahubali: The Beginning.' The duo is expected to share insights about their journey and experiences within the franchise, though official confirmation and details of the interview are awaited by eager fans.
Prabhas and Anushka Shetty to reunite after 8 Years Special Baahubali duos interview in works Report | - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenttelugumoviesPrabhas and Anushka Shetty to reunite after 8 years: Special 'Baahubali' duo's interview in works - ReportTrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyPrabhas and Anushka Shetty to reunite after 8 years: Special 'Baahubali' duo's interview in works - ReportTOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 11:57 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargePrabhas and Anushka Shetty, celebrated for their iconic roles in 'Baahubali,' are reportedly reuniting for a special interview after nearly eight years, commemorating the tenth anniversary of 'Baahubali: The Beginning.' The duo is expected to share insights about their journey and experiences within the franchise, though official confirmation and details of the interview are awaited by eager fans. Picture Credit: Facebook Amarendra Baahubali and Devasena are among the most iconic character pairings in recent film history, and portraying them by Prabhas and Anushka's onscreen pairing remains one of the most loved by the fans. Their natural chemistry in both 'Baahubali: The Beginning' and its sequel, 'Baahubali: The Conclusion', gained praise among the fans. Latest reports suggest the co-stars are reportedly reuniting after nearly eight years.According to a Pinkvilla report, the duo is set to come together for a special interview that will soon hit digital platforms. However, it is imperative to add that there has been no official confirmation yet.Prabhas Fans Go Wild at ‘The RajaSaab’ Teaser Launch in Hyderabad | Milk Bath, Dhol & Cutout Maniacelebrating a decade of 'Baahubali'The reunion is said to be related to the milestone of 'Baahubali: The Beginning,' which recently celebrated its tenth release anniversary. The film, directed by visionary filmmaker SS Rajamouli, not only shattered box-office records but also became a cultural phenomenon. It is said that Prabhas and Anushka will talk about their journey, experiences, and legacy in the franchise.Although the specifics of the format and release date of the reported interview being filmed are not yet specified, fans are waiting for official word. Just the possibility of seeing Prabhas and Anushka together again, even if it's not in a film but in a casual conversation, has kept social media talking.about 'Baahubali'The 'Baahubali' franchise is set in the fictional kingdom of Mahishmati and follows the epic saga of two brothers, Amarendra Baahubali and Bhallaladeva, who are locked in a fierce struggle for the throne.their upcoming filmsOn the current work front, Prabhas is working on multiple projects. He will be next seen in the horror-comedy film 'The Raja Saab'. He is working on a war drama film with director Hanu Raghavapudi and a cop action drama, 'Spirit', directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga.On the other hand, Anushka Shetty will be seen in a fierce role in the upcoming film, 'Ghaati'. Big B shares life lesson inspired by ‘Madhushala’
Amitabh Bachchan emphasizes commitment to a single path for success. He draws inspiration from his father's poem 'Madhushala'. Bachchan also hosts 'Kaun Banega Crorepati'. He finds it emotionally challenging to witness contestants' disappointment. He encourages them to view loss as a learning opportunity. He remembers those who tried and lost. He acknowledges the difficulty of comforting them.
Amitabh Bachchan shares life lesson inspired by ‘Madhushala’, urges fans to stick to one path and avoid distractions: ‘Keep moving in…’ | Hindi Movie News - Times of India Sign InTOIGo toTOIEtimeshomecinemanewsmovie reviewsmovie listingsbox officeanimepreviewsdid you knowvideosshowtimesblogsawardshindienglishtamiltelugumalayalamkannadabengalipunjabimarathibhojpuriGujaratiNewsentertainmenthindibollywoodAmitabh Bachchan shares life lesson inspired by ‘Madhushala’, urges fans to stick to one path and avoid distractions: ‘Keep moving in…’TrendingDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyDhanashree VermaAngelina JolieJessica HinesAR MurugadossNadiraArmaan MalikAmeesha PatelMandhira KapurAbhishek BachchanMithun ChakrabortyAmitabh Bachchan shares life lesson inspired by ‘Madhushala’, urges fans to stick to one path and avoid distractions: ‘Keep moving in…’TOI Entertainment Desk / etimes.in / Updated: Aug 20, 2025, 10:20 ISTShareAA+Text SizeSmallMediumLargeAmitabh Bachchan emphasizes commitment to a single path for success. He draws inspiration from his father's poem 'Madhushala'. Bachchan also hosts 'Kaun Banega Crorepati'. He finds it emotionally challenging to witness contestants' disappointment. He encourages them to view loss as a learning opportunity. He remembers those who tried and lost. He acknowledges the difficulty of comforting them.  Bollywood’s superstar Amitabh Bachchan believes that staying committed to one chosen path is the only way to reach your true destination. For him, wandering across multiple directions only causes distraction. Taking to his blog, he shared a thought that instantly caught attention, “Never take never granted for granted (sic).”Words inspired by Harivansh Rai Bachchan’s poemIn his post, the cine icon recited his father Harivansh Rai Bachchan’s famous poem ‘Madhushala’. He explained that life often presents many conflicting routes, with people suggesting different paths at every step. He wrote, “Pandering to authority right .. in the right sense ; but often people find themselves, in these conditions sitting on the fence .. for the right…”Amitabh Bachchan overflows with pride as Abhishek wins Best Actor at IFFM 2025Adding further, he penned, “Alag alag path batate sab, par main yeh batlaya hun; raah pakad tu ek chala chal pa jaaayega Madhushala… there is but one path to your final destination .. keep moving in the path and ye shall get there. (sic).”Hosting ‘Kaun Banega Crorepati’ with emotionBig B is currently hosting the new season of quiz show ‘Kaun Banega Crorepati’. In his blog entry on 15 August, he shared how tough it is for him to face the emotions of contestants who lose on the show.He wrote, “We sit on the hot seat and meet and confront the contestants that have ambitious hopes of winning during the week of their stay on the floor .. and when they cannot make it, it's the hardest to control the frustration of defeat and lost opportunity for them, yes. (sic.),”The heartbreak of watching tears on stageThe megastar admitted that their loss affects him just as deeply. He revealed, “But for me as well .. it is emotionally shattering to (see) their tears swell up as they find the week over, the Hooter played and the need to come and play, for whatever personal reasons, goes missing (sic.)”No words are strong enough to consoleAmitabh expressed how difficult it is to comfort them after they lose such a big chance. He noted, “No amount of consolation at the time can give them solace and understanding .. The need for some is crucial , the opportunity for some who have sacrificed their study or job opportunities to be at the FF and then the main chair to play and WIN, lost .. difficult to face such moments ..(sic.)”A smile of hope for tomorrowEven while dealing with these hard moments, he chooses to encourage contestants. He shared, “But what can be done .. a smile of 'try again' .. a word of encouragement that all shall be fine... loss is not the end of life .. its a learning and adheres to: Mann ka ho to acha; na ho toh zyada acha. (sic.)”Remembering those who try and loseHe ended his thoughts with a reflection that many may overlook. Big B wrote, “But few subscribe to this and that is heartbreaking… but as they say the show goes on .. you come away thinking of not the winner and his expertise and knowledge, but the one that tried and lost .. life is a tough job ..(sic.)”"Get the latest updates on Times of India, including reviews of the movie Coolie and War 2."About the AuthorTOI Entertainment DeskThe TOI Entertainment Desk is a dynamic and dedicated team of journalists, working tirelessly to bring the pulse of the entertainment world straight to the readers of The Times of India. No red carpet goes unrolled, no stage goes dark - our team spans the globe, bringing you the latest scoops and insider insights from Bollywood to Hollywood, and every entertainment hotspot in between. We don't just report; we tell tales of stardom and stories untold. Whether it's the rise of a new sensation or the seasoned journey of an industry veteran, the TOI Entertainment Desk is your front-row seat to the fascinating narratives that shape the entertainment landscape. Beyond the breaking news, we present a celebration of culture.
